M

Main - Class in Game
This is the main class of the project.

It handles the creation of the frame and the movement and actions of the characters
Main() - Constructor for class Game.Main
This constructs a new Main by calling the Main.initFrame() and Main.initComponents() methods and starting the main thread Main.run()
main(String[]) - Static method in class Game.Main
the main function.
MIDDLE_HEART_INDEX - Static variable in interface Game.WorldConstants.HEARTS
 
move() - Method in class Game.FireAttack
This method handles the movement of the FireAttack.

It moves the FireAttack to the correct position according to its speedX and its FireAttack.isMovingRight variables.

The method will remove the FireAttack if it hit an opposing player or if it reached the end of the screen.
MoveableCharacter - Class in Game
This class represents a character in the game which has the ability to move.
MoveableCharacter(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Game.MoveableCharacter
constructs a new MoveableCharacter with the given arguments
moveToLocation(int, int) - Method in class Game.MoveableCharacter
This method moves the MoveableCharacter to the target (x,y) position.
moveToLocation(int, int) - Method in class Game.Player
This method moves the MoveableCharacter to the target (x,y) position.
moveToLocation(int, int) - Method in class Game.Sprite
This method moves the MoveableCharacter to the target (x,y) position.
myPlayer - Variable in class Game.Main
the local player
